    intro trees

    trees

    trees.Rmd

    Get some OTT ids for a set of taxa. For example “Canis lupus” and the genus “Homo”:

    tnrs <- tnrs_match_names(c("Canis lupus", "Homo", "Felis catus", "Elephas", "Delphinus"))
tnrs
#>   search_string unique_name approximate_match ott_id is_synonym          flags
#> 1   canis lupus Canis lupus             FALSE 247341      FALSE               
#> 2          homo        Homo             FALSE 770309      FALSE sibling_higher
#> 3   felis catus Felis catus             FALSE 563166      FALSE               
#> 4       elephas     Elephas             FALSE 541927      FALSE               
#> 5     delphinus   Delphinus             FALSE 698409      FALSE sibling_higher
#>   number_matches
#> 1              1
#> 2              1
#> 3              2
#> 4              1
#> 5              1

    Once with the OTT id, we can get all the children from a taxon

    tol_node_info(ott_id = tnrs$ott_id[1])
#> 
#> OpenTree node.
#> 
#> Node id: ott247341
#> Number of terminal descendants: 19
#> Is taxon: TRUE
#> Name: Canis lupus
#> Rank: species
#> ott id: 247341
    lupus_tree <- tol_subtree(node_id = "ott247341", label_format = "id") 
lupus_tree$tip.label
#>  [1] "ott47497"   "ott47500"   "ott67371"   "ott80830"   "ott83897"  
#>  [6] "ott234374"  "ott247333"  "ott263524"  "ott318630"  "ott380529" 
#> [11] "ott531973"  "ott545727"  "ott883675"  "ott948004"  "ott987895" 
#> [16] "ott4941916" "ott5340002" "ott5839539" "ott7067596"

    Get the OTT ids for Homo

    tol_node_info(ott_id = tnrs$ott_id[2])
#> 
#> OpenTree node.
#> 
#> Node id: ott770309
#> Number of terminal descendants: 7
#> Is taxon: TRUE
#> Name: Homo
#> Rank: genus
#> ott id: 770309
    homo_tree <- tol_subtree(node_id = "ott770309", label_format = "id")
homo_tree$tip.label
#> [1] "ott83926"   "ott5341349" "ott3607676" "ott3607681" "ott3607671"
#> [6] "ott3607678" "ott3607673"
    #remove ott prefix from tip label:
my_ott_ids <- gsub("ott", "", c(lupus_tree$tip.label, homo_tree$tip.label))
my_ott_ids
#>  [1] "47497"   "47500"   "67371"   "80830"   "83897"   "234374"  "247333" 
#>  [8] "263524"  "318630"  "380529"  "531973"  "545727"  "883675"  "948004" 
#> [15] "987895"  "4941916" "5340002" "5839539" "7067596" "83926"   "5341349"
#> [22] "3607676" "3607681" "3607671" "3607678" "3607673"
all_ott_ids <- c(my_ott_ids, tnrs$ott_id[3:5])

final_tree <- tol_induced_subtree(ott_ids = all_ott_ids, label_format = "name")
#> 
Progress [----------------------------------] 0/91 (  0) ?s
Progress [================================] 91/91 (100)  0s
                                                            
#> Warning in collapse_singles(tr, show_progress): Dropping singleton

#> mrcaott47497ott3612503, mrcaott47497ott247331, mrcaott47497ott684074,
#> mrcaott47497ott3612500, Feliformia, mrcaott6940ott19397, mrcaott19397ott194349,
#> Felidae, mrcaott54737ott660452, mrcaott54737ott86170, mrcaott54737ott86175,
#> mrcaott54737ott442049, mrcaott54737ott86162, mrcaott54737ott86166, Felis,
#> mrcaott54737ott983179, mrcaott54737ott983177, mrcaott54737ott563166,
#> mrcaott72667ott180375, Afrotheria, mrcaott72667ott90404, mrcaott90404ott106258,
#> Proboscidea (order in Deuterostomia), Elephantidae, mrcaott106258ott298128
    plot(final_tree, cex = 0.5)
